name: 鍾孟雲
objective:
Course Title: Electronics Lab.
Description: Introduction to Electronic Instruments and Operational Training Basic Instruments and the Knowledge of electronic parts. The properties, feedback concepts, characteristics and circuits of the Diode; Chopper circuit and clamp circuit; BJT transistor and amplifier circuit; FET transistor and amplifier circuit; Class A, Class B amplifier.
schedule:
Week 1. 　　N/A
Week 2. 　　N/A
Week 3. 　　Introduction of laboratory equipment and equipment, training of electronic equipment operation
Week 4. 　　Diode characteristics
Week 5. 　　Diode rectifier circuit
Week 6. 　　Characteristics and applications of the diode
Week 7. 　　Wayne Bridge Oscillator
Week 8. 　　IC 555 astable oscillator
Week 9. 　　Mid-term. Take a week off.
Week 10. Characteristics of bipolar junction transistor (BJT)
Week 11. Switch of bipolar junction transistor (BJT)
Week 12. Bipolar junction transistor (BJT) bias circuit
Week 13. Integrator and Differentiator
Week 14. Field Effect Transistor (FET) Characteristics and Bias Voltage
Week 15. Field Effect Transistor (FET) Amplifier
Week 16. High frequency response of amplifier
Week 17. Theme reports 
Week 18. Final exam including written test and circuit implementation
The course will be adjusted according to the progress.
scorePolicy:
Mid-term exams: 0%
Final exams: 30%
Attendance: 20%
Experimental Results: 30%
Theme Reports: 20%
materials:
The instructor will prepare experiment handouts in English for all experiments that suits the class. The handouts will be passed out at the beginning of each experiment. The students should study related materials in the textbook of their Electronics course. The followings are the reference text books.
電子學實驗 (上)，第九版，陳瓊興編著，全華出版
電子學實驗 (下)，第八版，陳瓊興編著，全華出版

covid19.courseScoreMethod:
COVID-19 Alert Level 2
The laboratory has 24 benches, and can have students work in sufficient social distance from each other. So, experiments are still done in the laboratory. The Evaluation and grading policy will be the same above.

COVID-19 Alert Level 3 (or above)
The instructor will do on-line teaching and students attend the class on-line. The students will fill in their final exams online by google sheet. The Evaluation and grading policy will be the followings.
Mid-term exams: 0%
Final exams: 15%
Attendance: 40%
Experimental Results: 25%
Theme Reports: 20%
covid19.courseInfo: For online lectures, students are asked to log in using the school’s google mailbox. During the exam, the camera needs to be shot on the computer screen and desktop. And you need to prepare blank A4 paper by yourself.
